txt.en:
'I know you are busy aiding Ansurr with the Wheel, but if you can spare a moment, I need aid of my own.

'There is a powerful lizard who keeps killing our messengers. But, I have a plan on how to get rid of him! The first part involves toad-slime.

'The slime off the toads here in the Water-works has powerful befuddling qualities. If you bring me some, I can turn it into a powder we can use against the lizards.'
'Excellent. Once I add a couple of spices from my stores, this will be exactly what we need.'
'Without that slime we cannot hope to get rid of the lizards.'
The toads of the Water-works are known to exude a slime that has befuddling qualities.
Toads can be found all over the Water-works and to the east of the Great Wheel.\n\nGyrgir believes with some toad-slime he can create a solution to the lizard problem.
Gyrgir is in Hulwul-nefekh in central Water-works.\n\nYou should bring the toad-slime you collected to Gyrgir.
